sEtuqnA&ti# yantyaqnyaM || 
dvE dradha#sI saqtatI# vastaq Eka#H kEqSI viSvAq Buva#nAni viqdvAn | 
tiqrOqdhAyaiqtyasi#taqM ~MvasA#naH SuqkramA da#ttE anuqhAya# jAqryai || 
dEqvA vai yadyaqj~jE&ku#rvataq tadasu#rA akurvataq tE dEqvA EqtaM 
ma#hAyaqj~jama#paSyaqn tama#tanvatAgnihOqtraM ~Mvraqtama#kurvataq tasmAqd dvivra#taH syAqd dvirhya#gnihOqtraM juhva#ti paurNamAqsaM ~Myaqj~jama#gnIShOqmIya#M - [  ]   5
